pageTitle: Public events for December 9, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
UPDATED

Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, December 9, 2015:

Ottawa

10:00 a.m. – The Prime Minister attends a National Caucus meeting.

Room 237-C
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.

Ottawa

4:15 p.m. – The Prime Minister holds a media availability to discuss the government’s commitment to a tax cut for the middle class.

National Press Theatre
150 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 4:00 p.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.

Ottawa

7:00 - 7:30 p.m. – The Prime Minister speaks at the National Caucus Holiday Party. 

The Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario 

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
